description: The notification represents that a rogue AP or a station was
detected by WIDS.
The NMS would refer to MIB table under hh3cDot11WIDSDetectGroup
group to get more detailed information.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSDetectRogueTrap HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSRogueMAC s EXAMPL HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSRogueType i 1 HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC s EXAMPL HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11MonitorAPID s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11MonitorApRadioID i 9999

description: Represents which rogue AP or station.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSRogueMAC

description: Represents the rogue type.
The following value are supported
rogueAp(1) - A rogue AP
rogueStation(2) - A rogue Station
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSRogueType

description: Represents which monitor detected the rogue AP or station.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC

description: Represents monitor AP's APID.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11MonitorAPID

description: Represents monitor AP's radio ID
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11MonitorApRadioID

description: The notification represents a rogue Ad hoc station was detected.

event.Summary: Detected a rogue ad hoc station

description: Represents the MAC address of Ad hoc station.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAdHocMAC

description: Represents which monitor detected the rogue AP or station.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC

description: The notification represents which unauthorized SSID are
accessed in the network.
The notification will be sent to NMS when an
unauthorized SSID is detected on the network for the
first time.

event.Summary: Unauthorized SSID $v1 accessed in the network

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSUnauthorSSIDTrap HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11UnauthorSSIDName s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC s EXAMPL HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11MonitorAPID s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11MonitorApRadioID i 9999

description: Represents an unauthorized SSID.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11UnauthorSSIDName

description: Represents which monitor detected the rogue AP or station.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSMonitorMAC

description: Represents monitor AP's APID.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11MonitorAPID

description: Represents monitor AP's radio ID
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11MonitorApRadioID

description: The notification represents that a rogue device has aged out
and moved to history table or the device type has been changed
to friendly.
The notification will be sent to NMS whenever a rogue disappears.
Represents which rogue AP or station.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSRogueMAC

description: This notification occurs when some type of attack is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSDetectAttack HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisType i 1 HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisChl i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisDctTime s EXAMPLEE HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisAPName s EXAMPLE

description: Represents the type of attack.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisType

description: Represents the channel in which the attack was detected.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisChl

description: Represents the time at which this attack was detected.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisDctTime

description: Represents the name of the AP which detected this attack.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkHisAPName

description: This notification occurs whenever a detected device is classified
as rogue wireless-bridge.

event.Summary: Device is classified as rogue wireless bridge

description: Represents the name of the AP that detected the device.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPName

description: Represents the radio index of the AP that detected the device.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPRadioID

description: Represents the time at which the rogue AP was detected last time.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSRptAPLstDctTime

description: This notification occurs when flood attack is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSFloodTrap HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkMac s EXAMPL HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkFrameType s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSFirstTrapTime t 31536000

description: Represents mac address of attack source.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkMac

description: Represents attack frame type.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkFrameType

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSFirstTrapTime

description: This notification occurs when spoof attack is detected.

event.Summary: Spoof attack detected on the channel $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSSpoofTrap HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkMac s EXAMPL HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkFrameType s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkChannel i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkTime s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkDestMac s EXAMPL HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSFirstTrapTime t 31536000

description: Represents mac address of attack source.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkMac

description: Represents attack frame type.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkFrameType

description: Represents attack channel.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkChannel

description: Represents when attacking happened.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkTime

description: Represents mac address of attack destination.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkDestMac

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSFirstTrapTime

description: This notification occurs when weak IV attack is detected.

event.Summary: Weak IV attack detected on the channel $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSWeakIVTrap HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkMac s EXAMPL HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkChannel i 9999 HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkTime s EXAMPLE HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkDestMac s EXAMPL HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSFirstTrapTime t 31536000

description: Represents mac address of attack source.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkMac

description: Represents attack channel.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkChannel

description: Represents when attacking happened.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkTime

description: Represents mac address of attack destination.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSAtkDestMac

description: Represents the first trap time.
variables.name: HH3C-DOT11-WIDS-MIB::hh3cDot11WIDSFirstTrapTime
